message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the conversation at $1,800,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of what's being offered.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate you countering. While $1,400,000 is a tempting offer, I believe the product's true value is closer to my initial price.  Would you consider $1,650,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,550,000. I'm trying to be fair, but I also need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
